statements: SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessments;
SELECT project_name, location, start_date FROM environmental_impact_assessments;
SELECT project_name, assessment_status FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE completion_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, completion_date FROM environmental_impact_assessments ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE location = 'New York' AND assessment_status = 'Completed';
SELECT project_name, location, start_date, completion_date FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM environmental_impact_assessments ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE assessment_status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY start_date ASC, completion_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_assessments FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE completion_date IS NULL;
SELECT project_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM environmental_impact_assessments;
SELECT assessment_id, project_name, impact_rating FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE impact_rating > 3;
SELECT location, project_name, budget, status FROM development_projects;
SELECT project_name, location, status, budget FROM development_projects WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessments JOIN development_projects ON environmental_impact_assessments.project_name = development_projects.project_name;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE impact_rating > 4 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, location, impact_rating FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE location='California' AND impact_rating < 3;
SELECT project_name, budget FROM development_projects WHERE status='Completed' ORDER BY start_date;

SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessments JOIN development_projects ON environmental_impact_assessments.project_name = development_projects.project_name WHERE development_projects.budget > 100000;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM environmental_impact_assessments UNION SELECT DISTINCT location FROM development_projects;
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_name, location FROM Project ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT project_id, location, start_date FROM Project WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalImpact WHERE impact_rating > 3 ORDER BY impact_rating DESC;
SELECT assessment_id, assessor_name, assessment_date FROM Assessment WHERE assessment_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM Project WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT p.project_name, e.impact_description, a.assessor_name FROM Project p JOIN EnvironmentalImpact e ON p.project_id = e.project_id JOIN Assessment a ON e.impact_id = a.impact_id WHERE e.impact_rating > 5 ORDER BY e.impact_rating DESC;
SELECT project_name, location FROM Project UNION SELECT project_name, location FROM Project WHERE location IN ('California', 'Texas');
SELECT * FROM Project p, EnvironmentalImpact e, Assessment a WHERE p.project_id = e.project_id AND e.impact_id = a.impact_id AND a.assessment_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT * FROM project;
SELECT project_name, location FROM project WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM project ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact WHERE risk_level > 2;
SELECT assessment_date, assessor, result FROM assessment WHERE project_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM project WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, location FROM project WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact WHERE risk_level > 3 ORDER BY impact_type DESC;
SELECT project.project_name, assessment.assessor FROM project JOIN assessment ON project.project_id = assessment.project_id;
SELECT * FROM mitigation_plan WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01' AND end_date > '2023-06-30';
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalAssessments;
SELECT project_name, location FROM EnvironmentalAssessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ImpactTypes WHERE type_name = 'Air Quality';
SELECT project_name, project_type FROM Projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT consultant_name, expertise_area, contact_email FROM Consultants WHERE expertise_area = 'Environmental Impact';
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalAssessments WHERE assessment_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT project_name, location FROM EnvironmentalAssessments WHERE lead_consultant = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM ImpactTypes WHERE type_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects WHERE project_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT assessor_name, expertise_area FROM Consultants INNER JOIN Assessors ON Consultants.expertise_area = Assessors.expertise_area;
